rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall welcomes guests. It is designed in traditional Kerala style with tiled flooring, stone accents and open space that connects to the courtyard.

rooms.name: Courtyard
rooms.description: Central open courtyard integrating natural light and ventilation. It includes a small water feature adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with traditional Kerala woodwork, plaster walls and tiled floors. It overlooks the courtyard for natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated dining area adjacent to the living room, incorporating a traditional Kerala-style verandah for seating during meals.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with open space design following modern convenience while retaining Kerala aesthetics. Incorporates ample storage and work counter areas.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom with traditional Kerala design elements such as wooden beams, terracotta tiles, and natural color schemes. Includes a private balcony facing the courtyard.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed with Kerala style simplicity, ensuring adequate ventilation and natural light. Includes a small built-in cupboard.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater space integrated within the living area, with soundproofing panels and comfortable seating. Designed to maintain a traditional Kerala aesthetic while offering modern entertainment.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed bathroom serving both master and secondary bedrooms, designed with water-efficient fixtures and Kerala style tile work.

openings.material: Traditional Kerala style window with perforated shutters for ventilation

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the first floor, designed with a Kerala aesthetic featuring wooden beams and terracotta flooring.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Guest bathroom accompanying Bedroom 3, following similar design elements as other bathrooms.

openings.material: Stone and wood structure adhering to local construction norms
